mapper.select:
select p.id, p.name, description, price, stock, categoryLevelId, fileId, p.isDelete, p.createTime, filePath, c.name cname, parentId, type from easybuy_product p,easybuy_file f,easybuy_product_category c
p.id = f.productId and p.categoryLevelId = c.id and p.isDelete = 0

SELECT p.id, p.name, description, price, stock, categoryLevelId, fileId, filePath, p.isDelete, p.createTime, c.name, parentId, type FROM easybuy_product p,easybuy_file f,easybuy_product_category c WHERE p.id = f.productId and p.categoryLevelId = c.id and p.isDelete = 0 AND parentId IN (SELECT id FROM easybuy_product_category WHERE parentId = #{parentId})

SELECT p.id, p.name, description, price, stock, categoryLevelId, fileId, filePath, p.isDelete, p.createTime, c.name, parentId, type FROM easybuy_product p,easybuy_file f,easybuy_product_category c WHERE p.id = f.productId and p.categoryLevelId = c.id and p.isDelete = 0 AND parentId IN (SELECT id FROM easybuy_product_category WHERE parentId = #{parentId})

SELECT p.id,`name`, description, price, stock, categoryLevelId, fileId, p.createTime, filePath FROM easybuy_product p,easybuy_file f WHERE p.id = f.productId and p.isDelete = 0 and f.isDelete = 0 and p.id iN(SELECT productId FROM easybuy_order_detail GROUP BY productId) LIMIT 0,4

select p.id, p.name, description, price, stock, categoryLevelId, fileId, p.isDelete, p.createTime, filePath, c.name cname, parentId, type from easybuy_product p,easybuy_file f,easybuy_product_category c
p.id = f.productId and p.categoryLevelId = c.id and p.id = #{id} and p.isDelete = 0

SELECT c.name as categoryName,p.id, p.name, description, price, stock, categoryLevelId, fileId, filePath, p.isDelete, p.createTime, b.name as brandName, parentId, type FROM easybuy_product p,easybuy_file f,easybuy_product_category c,easybuy_brand b WHERE p.id = f.productId and p.categoryLevelId = c.id and b.id=p.brandId and p.isDelete = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO easybuy_product (description, name, price, brandId, stock, categoryLevelId, createTime) VALUES (#{description}, #{name}, #{price}, #{brandId}, #{stock}, #{categoryLevelId}, now());
INSERT INTO easybuy_file (filePath, userId, createTime) VALUES (#{filePath}, #{userId}, now());
mapper.update: update easybuy_file set productId=#{proId} where id = #{id}
update easybuy_product set fileId=#{fileId} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, description, price, brandId, stock, categoryLevelId, fileId, isDelete, createTime from easybuy_product where isDelete=0 and name=#{loginName}

select p.id, name, description, price, brandId,filepath, stock, categoryLevelId, fileId, p.createTime from easybuy_product p,easybuy_collections c,easybuy_file f where p.id = c.productId and f.productId = p.id and c.userId = #{userId} and p.isDelete = 0 and c.isDel = 0 and f.isDelete = 0

SELECT p.id, p.name, description, price, stock, categoryLevelId, fileId, p.isDelete, p.createTime, filePath, c.name cname, parentId, type FROM easybuy_product p,easybuy_product_category c,easybuy_file WHERE p.categoryLevelId = c.id and productId = p.id AND c.parentId = #{parentId} AND p.id != #{id} AND p.isDelete = 0 limit 0,3

select distinct p.id, p.name, description, price, stock, categoryLevelId, fileId, p.isDelete, p.createTime, filePath, c.parentId, type FROM easybuy_product p,easybuy_history h,easybuy_file f,easybuy_product_category c WHERE p.id = h.productid and f.productId = p.id and p.categoryLevelId = c.id and h.userId = #{userId} order by h.createTime desc limit 0,5
mapper.update: update easybuy_product set stock=#{stock} where id = #{id}
